F

fail() - Method in class net.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Fails the current test.
fail(String) - Method in class net.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Fails the current test for the given reason.
fail(Throwable) - Method in class net.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Fails the current test with the given reason, sets the number of expected resumes to 0, and throws the reason in the current thread and the main test thread.

G

getExpectedResumes() - Method in class net.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Gets the remaining number of expected resumes that must occur before any waiting/sleeping threads are unblocked.

resume(Thread) - Method in class net.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Resumes the waiter if thread is not the mainThread or the expected number of resumes have occurred.
